item.question: Guitarists Henry McCulloch and Chris Spedding, singers Ian Gillen and Yvonne Elliman and Andrew Lloyd Weber all did this in 1970:

answers.answer: Appeared on the original Jesus Christ Superstar album
Went to India to hang with The Maharishi
Appeared in the crowd shot Sgt. Pepper
Appeared in a Monty Python sketch

item.question: Guitarist who was a member of the legendary studio band for Motown dubbed The Funk Brothers; also the creator of "The Interval Study Method":
Renown texture guitarist for the American progressive heavy band known for the songs "Sober," "Undertow, "Aenema":
African guitar superstar Ray Phiri was a founding member of the Stimela, but received praise and acclaim following this successful 1986 recording:
